ResearchProjectDef.label: Holotape File: Enclave Advanced Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Military holotape containing the schematics and manufacturing processes for the Enclave Advanced Power Armor. This cutting-edge armor represents the pinnacle of pre-war engineering, offering exceptional protection and mobility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Holotape File: Enclave Advanced Power Armor MkII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Military holotape containing the schematics and manufacturing processes for the Enclave Advanced Power Armor MkII. This improved variant features enhanced environmental sealing and durability for prolonged combat scenarios.
